name: Quantum Rush - Online Future Racer
blurb: Quantum Rush is a combat-loaded future racer. It's time to revive this genre and take it a step further. Help us make it a big one!

rewards.reward:
PIONEER
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯


Thank you for sharing our vision and supporting us! You will be able to reserve your desired in-game name before the registration page goes public and you will receive our heartfelt thanks via email. Additionally, you will receive a digital wallpaper and a beautiful printable poster.

PILOTEER \u2013 Early Bird Special\r\n\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\r\nEverything on the PIONEER backer level, plus early closed beta access, a special tier 2 racer, a total of 4 garage slots from the start, special logo symbols for your in-game player logo and $20 worth of Qoins.

PILOTEER\r\n\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\r\nEverything on the PIONEER backer level, plus early closed beta access, a special tier 2 racer, a total of 4 garage slots from the start, special logo symbols for your in-game player logo and $20 worth of Qoins.

VETERAN\r\n\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\u00af\r\nEverything on the PIONEER backer level, plus early closed beta access, a special tier 4 racer, a total of 11 garage slots from the start, a mention in the credits, special logo symbols for your in-game player logo, a digital version of the game's soundtrack and $50 worth of Qoins.

CHAMPION – Early Bird Special
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯
Everything on the PIONEER backer level, plus early closed beta access, a special tier 6 racer, a total of 11 garage slots from the start, a mention in the credits, special logo symbols for your in-game player logo, a digital artbook and $100 worth of Qoins. Physical rewards: DVD version of the game and CD version of the soundtrack.

Physical rewards: DVD version of the game, CD version of the soundtrack, printed artbook and fan T-shirt.

FOUNDER
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯
Everything on the PIONEER backer level, plus priority name reservation, alpha and early closed beta access, your player name in a special FOUNDER color, your name appearing in racetrack adverts, special tier 6 and 8 racers, a special skin for the tier 8 racer, a total of 12 garage slots from the start, a mention in the credits, special logo symbols for your in-game player logo and $150 worth of Qoins. Physical rewards: USB stick with game client and soundtrack (credit-card style with Quantum Rush design), printed artbook and fan T-shirt signed by the Quantum Rush team.
▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫
No additional shipping costs, no matter where you live.

SENIOR FOUNDER
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯
Everything on the PIONEER backer level, plus priority name reservation, alpha and early closed beta access, your player name in a special SENIOR FOUNDER color, your name appearing in racetrack adverts, special tier 2, 4, 6 and 8 racers, a special skin for the tier 8 racer, a total of 14 garage slots from the start, a mention in the credits, special logo symbols for your in-game player logo and $150 worth of Qoins. Also, your name will be used for an in-game item! Physical rewards: USB stick with game client and soundtrack (credit-card style with Quantum Rush design), printed artbook, racer statue and fan T-shirt signed by the Quantum Rush team.
▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫
No additional shipping costs, no matter where you live.

QUANTUM RUSH HERO
¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯
Everything on the PIONEER backer level, plus priority name reservation, alpha and early closed beta access, your player name in a special QUANTUM RUSH HERO color, your very own exclusive racer (designed by you in collaboration with our artists), your name appearing in racetrack adverts, special tier 2, 4, 6 and 8 racers, a special skin for the tier 8 racer, a total of 14 garage slots from the start, a special mention in the credits, special logo symbols for your in-game player logo and $150 worth of Qoins. Also, your name will be used for an in-game item or racetrack of your choice! Physical rewards: USB stick with game client and soundtrack (credit-card style with Quantum Rush design), printed artbook, racer statue and fan T-shirt signed by the Quantum Rush team.
▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫
In addition, we will invite you to meet the team and spend some time with us here in Berlin! (includes 2 nights at a hotel, meeting with the team and party at the office).
▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫
